The letter from Grover Norquist to Georg: Nathan Deal, urging lawmakers to pass revenue-neutral tax legislation and warning against tax increases in other areas.
The argument made by Americans for Tax R: citing examples from Chicago, Washington, D.C., and South Carolina.
The comparison of excise tax rates on ci: 37 cents a pack) to other states, highlighting that Georgia has one of the lowest excise taxes on cigarettes in the nation.
The evidence provided by the University: Chicago researchers, who found that 75 percent of discarded cigarette packs in Cook County, Illinois (which includes Chicago), came from outside the county after a $1 increase in the cigarette tax.
